title: Identification Help - Hobo With A Shotgun Font
content:
Hello folks,

Is anyone here able to identify the attached font. I know I've come across this one before but can't put a name to it.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130917110253im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lobbycardsunset_6574.jpg)
author: oatmeal

comments.content:
Thanks typsetter1 - much appreciated - it also sometimes goes by "Colesium".

wiL
